p: The essential oil extracted from the leaves of T. diversifolia showed significant antioxidant activity and significant value with p < 0.0001 at the concentration of 5 mg·mL −1 with %AA 54.6 ± 0.06. The minimum inhibitory concentration (IC 50) was 4.30 mg·mL −1, with a strong correlation coefficient (R 2) of 0.9965.
